entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve handling when setting an unseekable stream as a tar entry's DataStream #76690
    8.0.0
  • AsParallel causes extremely slow 'WorkloadJitting' performance in BenchmarkDotNet benchmark #76689
  • NativeAOT StripSymbols should allow options for what to do with the symbol file #76686
    8.0.0
  • Why is `CCKeyDerivationPBKDF` not used in non-macOS Apple platforms? #76684
  • Microsoft.DotNet.CoreSetup.Test.HostActivation.StartupHooks.Muxer_activation* tests failed #76681
  • Linker CI build failure: Arcade SDK cannot be found in OSX x64 #76680
  • CI Linux failure: SyncHttpHandler_HttpProtocolTests_Dribble.GetAsync_ResponseHasNormalLineEndings_Success #76678
  • WASM CI failure: System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Http.Tests.HttpRequestMessageTest.BlobUri_Marshal_CorrectValues_Browser #76676
  • Buffer for enumerator #76675
  • Implementation of a `static` `virtual` method in base type is getting ignored by runtime in context of derived type #76673
  • [wasm] [question] JSInterop usage with javascript 'buf' data type #76672
  • [mono] Incorrect version comparison in the loader #76664
  • [wasm] Cannot handle variables of type dynamic #76663
  • Improve Networking docs #76661
    8.0.0
  • `Monitor.TryEnter` sometimes fails even if `Monitor.IsEntered` returns `true` #76660
  • Investigate size of `.rela.dyn` section on Linux #76657
    8.0.0
  • Remove runtime dependencies on libstdc++ #76655
    8.0.0
  • [release/3.1] CI failures: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpProtocolTests #76654
  • [release/3.1] CI failure: CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestUsageTests.AlwaysVersion3 - unable to build chain to self-signed root for signer (null) #76653
  • [release/3.1] CI failure: System.Globalization.Tests.IdnMappingIdnaConformanceTests.GetUnicode_Invalid #76651
  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #76648

Closed

  • [Perf -7%] System.Text.Perf_Utf8Encoding.GetBytes #45554
    Future
  • MARSHALLED_UNICODE_STRING[] array marshalling leaks memory #76584
    7.0.x
  • [NativeAot] Devirtualization opportunity around field loads #74000
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'opcode == CEE_LDFLD && objType != nullptr' in 'ReturnTestsType:Return.LocalStructFieldByRef_Invalid_ReturnPtrToStack(Struct):byref:this' during 'Importation' #74593
    8.0.0
  • Mutating results of `JsonSerializerContext.GetTypeInfo` can result in corruption of static metadata properties #76682
    7.0.0
  • Extremely high and unexpected memory commit sizes using DOTNET_GCHeapHardLimit #75538
    Future
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting consistent naming for permit count #76557
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_Span.RsaDecryptPkcs1LeadingZero test is failing on Windows.10.Amd64.ServerRS5 #76611
  • Consider obsoleting `RSA.EncryptValue`, `RSA.DecryptValue` #73969
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'src->OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_FIELD, GT_IND, GT_OBJ, GT_CALL, GT_MKREFANY, GT_RET_EXPR, GT_COMMA, GT_CNS_VEC) || ((src->TypeGet() != TYP_STRUCT) && src->OperIsSIMD())' #76550
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism\\coreroot_determinism.cmd #75820
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-RTM/b539509/b539509/b539509.sh #75819
    7.0.0
  • Failures in checked/release asm diffs #76347
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] dotnet run doesn't work for relative path #76609
    7.0.0
  • VerifyHeap fails on frozen heap #76232
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a JsonEncodedText.Value property #69716
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run binaries located on network shares #74418
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\HugeField1\\HugeField1.cmd #73139
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\HugeField1\\HugeField1.cmd #43818
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: ilasm round-trip HugeField2 #38529
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: ilasm round-trip hugeexpr1 #38515
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Ensure we cleanup the marshalling for elements of collections (stateful and stateless) #76693
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • API Dept - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [Release/7.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76691
    Servicing-consider, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use CCKeyDerivationPBKDF on iOS #76688
    area-System.Security
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System.Runtime.Intrinsics #76687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Enable sourcelink in source-build #76685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make resolver GetTypeInfo methods return new instances on every call #76683
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Low memory fixes #76674
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Preference locals away from PUTARG_REG killed registers #76671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging a failing debugger test #76670
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][interp] Optimize out some ldloca uses #76669
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Abs intrinsics for Amd64 #76668
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Fix incorrect version comparison in loader #76665
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Check for non-valid compare chains (#76566) #76662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Failfast on Vector256 test failure #76656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Robustify speech recognition test #76652
    area-System.Speech
  • Add RIDs for Tizen 7.0 #76650
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Revert "Revert frozen RuntimeType objects and write barriers for frozen objects" #76649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Cleanup, share more code between x86 and x64 in `genAllocLclFrame` #76647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Ensure we cleanup the marshalling for elements of collections (stateful and stateless) #76629
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Bump the runtime net6 versions for GA #76270
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System/System.Numerics #76103
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix gtGetClassHandle for static fields (R2R only) #74075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #75813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.11
  • Replace assert with BADCODE #75068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76035
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Backport consolidation of Newtonsoft versions #76522
    area-Meta, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0][mono] Fix iOS/tvOS build with Xcode 14 #76448
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76075
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76327
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76392
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #75637
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Fix binary serialization of DateTime with DCS and add test. #75650
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #75643
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Allow for null XmlSerializers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #75638
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.11
  • [hot_reload] Fix unresolved token when new nested structs are used #76618
    area-EnC-mono
  • Updating Vector128 to have its software fallback be 2x Vector64<T> ops #76592
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Obsolete `RSA.EncryptValue` and `RSA.DecryptValue` #76514
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • Rename request count to permit count on System.Threading.RateLimiting #76558
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • remove LangVersion workarounds #76394
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75772
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.11
  • [release/7.0] [hot_reload] Fix unresolved token when new nested structs are used #76625
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add workaround for Windows 10 (1903) bug to RSABCrypt #76633
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Rename request count to permit count on System.Threading.RateLimiting #76623
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] fix lower heap hard limit condition for regions #76588
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix Interop.Gdi32.StartDoc p/invoke #76582
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Drawing, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0][Android] Backport fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #76565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 7.0.0
  • Include bitcasts in an assert #76628
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make sure the initial mark list size is capped #76083
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable failing debugger test #76667
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Don't scan bricks of frozen segments in verify_heap #76645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove all uses of `SString::Printf()` accepting `WCHAR` #76571
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • roll-back helix change from arm32 #76646
    test-enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update branding to 6.0.11 #76620
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking
  • Support Arm64 "constructed" constants in SuperPMI asm diffs #76616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Backport: work around GitHub .patch URL issue" #76659
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Restore correct llvm 14 version for macOS too #76640
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix FOH for SOS #76586
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add `JsonEncodedText.Value` #76545
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid __vsnprintf_s for printing method names #76619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ilasm] Lazily allocate memory in Indx256 #76590
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Streamline root commands and cli helpers #76537
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Remove unused EmitBlobWithRelocs method #76631
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • cherry-picking small refactor fix from 7.0 #76634
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta

Updated

  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: Use the default cache for emcc #76694
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Rewrite the shared JsonSerializerOptions cache implementation. #76607
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add RIDs for Tizen 7.0 #76600
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • Introduce a WASM JIT for interpreter opcodes #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    Servicing-consider, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add RIDs for Tizen6.5 and 7.0 #76599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Migrate docker containers to latest tags #76630
  • [IGNORE] [Experiment] Try to return MSBuild Server back. #76536
    NO-MERGE
  • [release/6.0] Use new buildpools #76208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [wasm] CI improvements for triggering jobs #76215
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 #75648
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add portable linux source build leg #75546
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: re-enable SIMD tests on v8, and nodejs #75742
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Use normal VNs when adding NRE exception sets #76639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update docs on libraries cross build #76614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccExportedRuntimeMethod MSBuild item #76455
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.IO
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update compiler build #75935
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add GenTreeID in allocating registers table #76521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Vector128's Sum and Dot SIMD implementation #76446
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Outerloop fix for libraries #74468
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • [NativeAOT] Enable smoke tests on macOS #76560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Set target SDK version to 31 in AndroidAppBuilder #76461
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add readmes to reflection #76567
    documentation, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #76481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Green Threads] Unique managed thread objects/ids are not implemented #2014

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add Green Threads experiment #1985

Updated

  • Make FCall transition go through lambda that can be translated into a functionpointer + pointer arg parameter #2019

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet publish --os Linux` in .NET 7 references .NET 6 #28350
  • Compilator can't find the matching overload for operator+ when implementing nullability to project #28342
  • Add integration tests for the optional rules in the ValidatePackage and ValidateAssemblies tasks #28337

Closed

  • PublishRelease=true in project file doesn't actually change the configuration to "Release" when running "dotnet publish" #26732
  • [6.0.10x] NuGet version incoherency between sdk and templating #28107
  • dotnet nuget --store-password-in-clear-text options doesn't work on docker #28028

PullRequests

Created

  • normalize accessibility when not including internal symbols #28348
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Baseline Update for 6.0.306 #28346
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add missing EnableRuleAttributesMustMatch task property #28338
    Servicing-consider, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Enable codeql #28330
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ApiCompatEnableRuleCannotChangeParameterName prop #28344
  • Update windows images #28178
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add missing EnableRuleAttributesMustMatch task parameter #28336
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Update branding to 6.0.111 #28322
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #28333
    Area-Tools
  • Add --ucr shorthand for --use-current-runtime #27971
    Area-CLI
  • Add Description to Workload --info #27973
    Area-CLI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2012663 #27667
  • Add warning when targeting 7.0 in 17.3 and remove 7.0 from the list of supported targets #28224
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 7.0.2xx for loc build #28304
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28303
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    Area-Common templates

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Recent changes to ref fields specification #6337
  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
  • Anonymous Interface Objects #4301

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# code shown when using "go to definition" should be more readable #64516
  • 'CSharpDeclareAsNullableCodeFixProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled #64515
  • LSIF Generator cannot be run on non-windows machines. #64510
  • Formatting: no setting for spacing after target-typed new keyword, default formatting conflicts with StyleCop's SA1000 #64509
  • Report error implementing unannotated interface member with `[UnscopedRef]` member #64508
  • Report an error referencing method from a module with unrecognized RefSafetyRulesAttribute.Version #64507
  • Suggest usings for types from available shared frameworks and add required <FrameworkReference /> along with using directive #64505
  • Implement message-pack serialization of SourceText #64504
  • Switch Expression "Add Cases" fixers #64502
  • Test skip execution due to "Implementation of a `static` `virtual` method in derived type is getting ignored by runtime" #64501
  • Improve reporting/UI for CS0535: T does not implement interface member M #64500
  • Razor compilation fails on dotnet 6 project with 7.0.100-rc.1.22431.12 #64499

Closed

  • Intellisense ignore case sensitivity in case of enums and prefers wrong items #38297
    Backlog
  • Crash while editing #28040
    Backlog
  • Add C# option to auto-show the completion list in argument lists after `(` (etc.) and `, ` (like VB does already) #41658
    Backlog
  • Autocompletion suggests `struct` after `sealed record` #64465
  • Unnecessary ref safety error reported for deconstruction #64448
    17.4
  • Revise grammar and syntax model for `scoped` #62983
    17.4
  • Exhaustive pattern matching of objects in switch expresssions should not require a wildcard to avoid a CS8509 warning #64497

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify that setting to use .NET SDK preview only exists in non-preview Visual Studio #64514
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Respond to missed feedback #64513
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64498
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simpler bidirectional streaming invocation in OOP. #64494
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64512
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Do not suggest `struct` after `record` with `abstract` or `sealed` modifiers #64506
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Only get the associated symbol, not the containing symbol #64496
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #64511
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not report a secondary NFW exception after already reporting one earlier. #64412
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable CodeQL on official builds #64450
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64503
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Semantic snippets - change filter to keep old snippets in if replacement does not exist #64459
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64495
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add additional information to help F# with navigating to symbols #64475
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64492
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64493
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove dependency on ms.extensions.dependencyinjection from roslyn lsp #64481
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Add analyzer info for detecting IntPtr/UintPtr behavioral changes #64485
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64519
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64518
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis #64470
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64517
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update ref `foreach` tests #64276
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Add instrumentation to investigate flakiness in `ConstantFolding_01` #64404
    Test, Flaky
  • Add and use TargetFramework.Net70 #64490
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Union to match the semantics of GetApplicableAnalyzers #64484
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64424
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move to a simpler model of writing assets out to OOP #64486
    Area-IDE
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers
  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Revert "Implement IAttributeOperation (#59369)"" #64488
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow TS to derive from the more performant internal API #64258
    Area-IDE
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Track EA APIs #64487
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to new image #64472
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle assert found during IDE LSIF testing #64413
    Area-Compilers
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Isolated CSS is not entirely isolated #44387
  • Blazor Components-E2E Pipeline is Broken #44385
  • CORS issue in .NET Core 6 API #44384
  • SignalR client library needs better logging/access to underlying message data #44383
  • Razor Class Library Different Output when using GeneratePackageOnBuild vs dotnet pack #44382
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext_netty #44377
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #44376

Closed

  • [Analyzer] Add route constraint based on parameter type #44320
  • Add method to tell a blazor app that the requested ressource for a parameter razor component could not be found #25564
    Backlog
  • Error when using auth with prerendering after trimming #44007
    7.0.0
  • AuthenticationSchemeOptions delegates don't have an async compatible alternative #44355
  • Blazor background hosted services with PWA support #21676
    Backlog
  • Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #43523
    8.0-preview1
  • Improve HttpSysOptions descriptions #28297
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor: NavigationManager RegisterLocationChangingHandler and LocationChanged never are invoked #44365
  • Blazor wasm base path should be configurable post publish #22148
    Backlog
  • How to properly destroy javascript component and avoid JSDisconnectedException #44180
  • Add a new parameter in PersistentComponentState.RegisterOnPersisting #44280
  • ASP.NET Core with Angular projec type #44289
  • ASP.NET core hybrid solution for SPA or PWA apps #44331
  • Auto CSRF token triggers a warning in the HTML validator #44341
  • Dynamic blazor #44375
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #44366

PullRequests

Created

  • Assert test result #44249 #44388
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a way to delete seed made with HasData without removing data in the database #29273
  • JSON/Query: optimize casts to nvarchar(max) in json queries where possible #29267
    Backlog
  • Use custom converter results in duplicate resulting column names #29265
  • Confusing doc-comments on DeleteBehavior enum #29261
    Backlog
  • Sqlite: AddTicks translation gives incorrect results #29260
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Query/Sqlite: AddMonths and AddTicks translation may lead to small result discrepancies vs l2o #25851
    MQ
  • Recursive CTE call in FromSqlRaw always fails with InvalidOperationException (was called with non-composable SQL and with a query composing over it) #29266
  • Count() times out on IQueryable #29224
  • Excessive memory usage after enabling DbContextFactory #28988
    6.0.11
  • [6.0.x] Avoid re-sending PRAGMA KEY on pooled SQLite connections #28967
    6.0.11
  • Aggregate function on owned type fails in EF7 #29201
    7.0.0
  • No-Relational Provider - SaveChanges #29263
  • Owned Entity throws InvalidOperationException inside RelationalSqlTranslatingExpressionVisitor.TryRewriteEntityEquality #29142
    7.0.0
  • Table spitting sample in docs throws "Sequence contains no elements" from `SqlExpressionFactory` in EF7 #29196
    7.0.0
  • AddSqlServer should have an `optionsAction` that provide the `IServiceProvider` #29242
  • Regression in EF Core 7? Nullable DateTime to Non-nullable DateTime conversion bug when using SqlServer type DateTime instead of DateTime2 #29239

PullRequests

Created

  • [8.0] Fix to #29260 - Sqlite: AddTicks translation gives incorrect results #29274

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29272

Merged

  • [main] Switch to consolidated Windows build images and non-Svc pools #29271
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Switch to consolidated Windows build images #29270
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [MQ] Add test changes to AddMonths test for Sqlite #29262
    auto-merge
  • [release/3.1] Switch to consolidated Windows build images #29268
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/2.1] Switch to consolidated Windows build images and Ubuntu 20.04 #29264
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29257
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29258
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Query: Allow final GroupBy navigation #29205
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Use type mapping from IDbFunction while translating (#27995) #29216
